name: Pickle Rob
description:
IMPORTANT

Don't be a bastard.

Presentation

Made in August 2019 for the Pickle Jam.

It was my seventh game jam.

The theme was "Pickles, Gore (use both)".

Tools

Gamemaker Studio: 2, Aseprite.

Credits

I did everything by myself during the jam, except:

- Font Amatic

Gameplay

You can use PageUp and PageDown to resize the window.

You only need the left click.

Press R to restart.

Tips (spoiler)

- There are two endings.
